trans-unit.source: Lists all sequences or those that match your search criteria.

seg-source.mrk: Lists all sequences or those that match your search criteria.

target.mrk: すべての順序または検索基準に一致する順序を一覧表示します。

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Sequences</uicontrol> screen lists sequences in accordance with your search criteria. You can display information about the sequence, its values and administrative data by clicking the sequence and navigating to the <uicontrol>Sequence</uicontrol> screen.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Sequences</uicontrol> screen lists sequences in accordance with your search criteria.
You can display information about the sequence, its values and administrative data by clicking the sequence and navigating to the <uicontrol>Sequence</uicontrol> screen.

target.mrk: 検索基準に従って、<uicontrol>順序</uicontrol>画面に順序が一覧表示されます。
順序をクリックし、<uicontrol>順序</uicontrol>画面にナビゲートすると、順序、その値、および管理データに関する情報を照会することができます。

trans-unit.source: Standard functions are available for creating, displaying, changing and deleting sort sequences. Moreover:

seg-source.mrk: Standard functions are available for creating, displaying, changing and deleting sort sequences.

target.mrk: ソート順序を登録、照会、変更、および削除するための標準機能を使用することができます。
さらに、以下のようになります。

trans-unit.source: Clicking on a sequence with the status <uicontrol>Own Draft</uicontrol> opens the corresponding draft in edit mode.

seg-source.mrk: Clicking on a sequence with the status <uicontrol>Own Draft</uicontrol> opens the corresponding draft in edit mode.

target.mrk: ステータスが<uicontrol>独自ドラフト</uicontrol>の順序をクリックすると、対応するドラフトが編集モードで開きます。

trans-unit.source: Clicking on a sequence with the status <uicontrol>Locked by Another User</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Unsaved Changes by Another User</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Unchanged</uicontrol> opens the corresponding sequence in display mode.

seg-source.mrk: Clicking on a sequence with the status <uicontrol>Locked by Another User</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Unsaved Changes by Another User</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Unchanged</uicontrol> opens the corresponding sequence in display mode.

target.mrk: ステータスが<uicontrol>別ユーザによりロック済</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>他のユーザによる未保存の変更</uicontrol>、または<uicontrol>未変更</uicontrol>の順序をクリックすると、対応するドラフトが照会モードで開きます。

trans-unit.source: To delete a sequence, select an entry on the <uicontrol>Sequences</uicontrol> screen and press <uicontrol>Delete</uicontrol>. Alternatively, display a sequence and press <uicontrol>Remove</uicontrol> on the <uicontrol>Sequence</uicontrol> screen.

seg-source.mrk: To delete a sequence, select an entry on the <uicontrol>Sequences</uicontrol> screen and press <uicontrol>Delete</uicontrol>.
Alternatively, display a sequence and press <uicontrol>Remove</uicontrol> on the <uicontrol>Sequence</uicontrol> screen.

target.mrk: 順序を削除するには、<uicontrol>順序</uicontrol>画面でエントリを選択し、<uicontrol>削除</uicontrol>を押します。
または、順序を表示し、<uicontrol>順序</uicontrol>画面で<uicontrol>除外</uicontrol>を押します。
